name: MVPet's Github Page
body:
### Welcome to MVPet's Github Page This is the page where all my major projects are hosted. The source is available to download and each project has a demo video showing it off. ### Major Projects include: ### Project G.F.T. and vENGINE A Prototype of Both Engine & Game,
[http://mvpet.github.io/Project-G.F.T/](http://mvpet.github.io/Project-G.F.T/) ### Advance Wars EX An altered take on the Advance Wars formula.
Developed using C++ and SFML API. [http://mvpet.github.io/FEXAW](http://mvpet.github.io/FEXAW) ### Megaman Battle Chip Challenge Battle Arena A game that integrates MOBA elements into Battle Network's gameplay.
Developed using C# and Unity2D. [http://mvpet.github.io/MMBNNE/](http://mvpet.github.io/MMBNNE/) ### Buoyancy Simulation A project I recently finished at ITMS at URI.
Developed using C# and Unity3D. [http://itmsunity.github.io/OceanMovie](http://itmsunity.github.io/OceanMovie) ### Hunger Game A project I developed for the Nutrition department at URI.
Developed using ActionScript3 and Flixel API. [http://mvpet.github.io/GreenEating](http://mvpet.github.io/GreenEating)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
